body:
Dear Bayanda,


Please find in the ZIP below some infos on the Film 3M used by Chantal
Basurto in her PhD thesis completed this month (soon to be online on
infoscience.epfl.ch) together with a monitored BSDF file from LESO-PB
goniophotometer at EPFL:


ftp://kaemco.synology.me/Geronimo/3M_prismatic_film.zip


You can also download Geronimo version 1.2, which is an easy tool to
simulate CFS with monitored BSDF:


ftp://kaemco.synology.me/Geronimo/Geronimo_v1.2.zip


Hope this helps,
Jerome




Dr Jérôme KAEMPF
<jk at kaemco.ch>
*[image: EPFL] <http://people.epfl.ch/kaempf> *// team leader *urban
systems simulation*
[image: kaemco] <http://www.kaemco.ch> // founder and managing partner




2014-10-24 17:19 GMT+02:00 Bayanda <bayanda at pjc.co.za>:
___
